title: Graphic Design Assistant
job_overview:
About Us
We are Majority, a fast-growing British audio brand specialising in innovative, affordable soundbars, radios, CD players, and HiFi systems. With a passion for great sound and sustainable design, our products are enjoyed by customers around the world. As we continue to expand our global presence, we’re looking for a skilled and reliable Virtual Assistant Graphic Designer to support our creative and e-commerce teams.

About the Role
This is an exciting opportunity for a versatile designer who can confidently handle a range of creative tasks — from product packaging and manuals to digital content for Amazon and beyond.

Key Responsibilities

Design product giftboxes and packaging artwork using Adobe Illustrator

Edit and update listing images for online platforms

Create promotional materials such as flyers, leaflets, and banners

Prepare visually engaging PowerPoint presentations

Edit and update product manuals, ensuring clarity, consistency, and brand alignment

Support Amazon content management, including:

Uploading bulk images and A+ Content via Seller Central

Running A/B tests on product listings

Ensuring visuals meet Amazon’s specifications and brand standards

Ensure all creative output adheres to brand guidelines and quality standards

Provide general design and admin support to the wider team

Requirements

Proven experience in graphic design (portfolio required)

Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Canva, and PowerPoint

Working knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro for basic video edits (e.g. product promos or social clips)

Strong attention to detail, especially when working with text-heavy documents like manuals

Familiarity with Amazon Seller Central, including A+ Content creation, bulk uploads, and listing optimisation

Excellent eye for layout, colour, and typography

Ability to work independently and manage multiple remote tasks

Strong communication and organisational skills

Desirable

Experience editing or designing user manuals or technical documents

Familiarity with consumer electronics or the audio industry

Knowledge of print production processes

To Apply
Please send your CV, portfolio (with examples of relevant work), and a short introduction outlining your experience and availability.
